memos.headline: Fire bei GreenChem
memos.subline: Initial statement for internal use only
memos.copytext: At GreenChem today near CITY a TYPE has occurred. According to the current state of information, EMPLOYEEINJURED employee(s), EXTNERNALEMPLOYEEINJURED external employee(s) and EXTNERNAL other people have been injured. They will receive medical treatment as required. The emergency services as well as the responsible authorities have been alerted immediately to combat or limit the damage. We have set the crisis potential at stage CRISISPOTENTIAL.
